problem_names:
lemma Integer_Integral_simps[simp]:
  "div\<cdot>(MkI\<cdot>x)\<cdot>(MkI\<cdot>y) = MkI\<cdot>(Rings.divide x y)"
  "mod\<cdot>(MkI\<cdot>x)\<cdot>(MkI\<cdot>y) = MkI\<cdot>(Rings.modulo x y)"
  "fromInteger\<cdot>i = i"
translations:
lemma Integer_Integral_simps[simp]:
  "div\<cdot>(MkI\<cdot>x)\<cdot>(MkI\<cdot>y) = MkI\<cdot>(Rings.divide x y)"
  "mod\<cdot>(MkI\<cdot>x)\<cdot>(MkI\<cdot>y) = MkI\<cdot>(Rings.modulo x y)"
  "fromInteger\<cdot>i = i"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. div\<cdot>(MkI\<cdot>x)\<cdot>(MkI\<cdot>y) = MkI\<cdot>(divide x y) &&&
    mod\<cdot>(MkI\<cdot>x)\<cdot>(MkI\<cdot>y) = MkI\<cdot>(modulo x y) &&&
    fromInteger\<cdot>i = i

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (case MkI\<cdot>x of
     MkI\<cdot>x \<Rightarrow>
       \<Lambda> (MkI\<cdot>y). MkI\<cdot>(divide x y))\<cdot>
    (MkI\<cdot>y) =
    MkI\<cdot>(divide x y) &&&
    (case MkI\<cdot>x of
     MkI\<cdot>x \<Rightarrow>
       \<Lambda> (MkI\<cdot>y). MkI\<cdot>(modulo x y))\<cdot>
    (MkI\<cdot>y) =
    MkI\<cdot>(modulo x y) &&&
    (\<Lambda> x. x)\<cdot>i = i
